== Main Inclusion Report for zope-cps ==

 0. ''Availability:'' 
** The package is available in Debian experimental.
 0. ''Rationale:''  
** Collaborative Portal Server ("<nowiki>[[http://www.cps-project.org|CPS]]</nowiki>") is the most complete Open Source solution available for building ECM applications. CPS comes also as a user-friendly application for entreprise-grade content management with many collaboration features, and fits very well in a server-oriented distribution.
 0. ''Security:'' 
** No CVEs or other security issues.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** No significant bugs in "<nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/zope-cps|Debbugs]]</nowiki>"
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS and the Debian Policy.
** Standard debhelper packaging
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** zope2.8, zope-common
** The following packages are required in order to run a CPS site: 
*** "<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MainInclusionReportZope-CMF1.5|zope-cmf1.5]]</nowiki>"
*** "<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MainInclusionReportZope-CMFQuickInstallerTool|zope-cmfquickinstallertool]]</nowiki>"
*** "<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MainInclusionReportZope-BTreeFolder2|zope-btreefolder2]]</nowiki>"
*** "<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MainInclusionReportZope-CPS-Localizer|zope-cps-localizer]]</nowiki>"
*** "<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MainInclusionReportZope-CPS-PortalTransforms|zope-cps-portaltransforms]]</nowiki>"
*** "<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MainInclusionReportZope-CPS-TranslationService|zope-cps-translationservice]]</nowiki>"
*** "<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MainInclusionReportZope-CPSSkins|zope-cpsskins]]</nowiki>"
*** "<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/MainInclusionReportZope-Epoz|zope-epoz]]</nowiki>"
